artist: Artist: Bob Fried; Publisher: Family Dog Productions, San Francisco
creditline: Gift of Paul Maurer and Scott West
description: photo collage; woman with her PL hand over her head seated in a bentwood rocking chair in a room with a white and blue floor and red wall with yellow and blue ovals; yellow ladder at right; rectangular window in UL with a man wearing a top hat, with a cigarette in his mouth and another in his PL hand, with "MY CARD MAM" in a speaking bubble to his right; black border; green typewritten text at bottom

title: "Rocking Chair," Genesis, Siegel Schwall, Mother Earth, January 12-14, Avalon Ballroom
